contentrichtext.text: '''Prasuti''' is a [[Hinduism|Hindu]] [[goddess]], who is the daughter of [[Svayambhuva Manu]] and [[Shatarupa]], wife of [[Daksha]] and mother of many daughters by him. ==Marriage and children== Marriage of [[Daksh & Prasuti]] was the first marriage in Hinduism. Both gave birth to "60 Daughters". Out of them 13 daughters were married to [[Dharma]], [[Svaha]] to [[Agni]], Swadha to Pitras, [[Diti]] and [[Aditi]] to [[Kashyapa]]. Rohini & Revati to Chandra & [[Khyati]] to Rishi [[Bhrigu]]. But, the most significant of Prasuti's daughters is Sati, an incarnation of Goddess [[Shakti]]. [[Sati (goddess)|Sati]] married Lord [[Shiva]]. {{HinduMythology}} [[Category:Hindu goddesses]] {{Hindu-myth-stub}}
